SRP.Q: On the Moving time (hours) dimension, what is the spatial relationship of black Tram relative to six ship in terms of vertical (above/below) direction?
SRP.A: {black Tram} is {below} {six ship} on the Moving time (hours) dimension.

SRP.Q: Which dimension is the second position to the left of dimension Route deviation rate (%)?
SRP.A: The second position to the left of Route deviation rate (%) is {Total transit time (hours)}.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Moving time (hours)} axis is positioned at the rightmost of the parallel chart.

SRP.Q: Which dimension axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart?
SRP.A: The {Total transit time (hours)} axis is positioned at the leftmost of the parallel chart.

VPR.Q: Which dimension has the highest variability in the parallel-coordinates chart?
VPR.A: {Total transit time (hours)} shows the highest variability.

VPR.Q: What kind of correlation exists between Route deviation rate (%) and dimension Moving time (hours)
VPR.A: There is {Weak Correlation} between Route deviation rate (%) and Moving time (hours).
